main event: Four bright lights were observed in the sky over Pine City, Minnesota, on the night of August 23, 1965.
interesting points: The objects changed color from vivid red to green to white repeatedly., The lights were observed for a total duration of approximately 2 hours and 20 minutes., Witnesses described the lights as moving erratically while also hovering for extended periods., The observation was made during a bright night, making the lights appear more prominent than regular stars., The report concluded that the objects were identified as astronomical bodies, specifically the stars Capella, Gaia Auriga, Jupiter, and Aldebaran.
sighted object: four bright lights in the sky
witness description: A family of four, including parents and a wife, observing the lights from a cabin near Cross Lake.
